thread.title: Five area players selected for Shrine Bowl
thread.title_full: Five area players selected for Shrine Bowl

title: Five area players selected for Shrine Bowl
text:
iStock/halbergman New Bern, Craven County - 
Five high school football players from Eastern North Carolina were selected to play for the North Carolina team in the annual Shrine Bowl on Dec. 19. 
The Shrine Bowl pits some of the top teams from North and South Carolina in a game each year. This yearâ€™s event will be held in Gibbs Stadium on the campus of Wofford College in Spartanburg, S.C. 
The local players chosen to play are: 
Cornell Powell, WR, J.H. Rose 
Tyric McCarter, CB, New Bern 
Charles Noble, LB, New Bern 
Tahj Deans, WR, Southern Nash 
Keyshawn Canady, CB, Wallace-Rose Hill 
New Bern head coach Bobby Curlings will serve as an assistant for the North Carolina team.
